summary:
A temporary and a permanent stay version player camp with great views of the Rift!

*AS IS* - I won't be editing this any time soon. Current focus mod is "UnderSkyrim". Thanks for your understanding.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][i][b][size=3][color=#fdeada]The [/color][/size][SIZE=9][color=#e36c09]Rift Cave Dwelling[/color][/SIZE][/b][/i][/font][/center][center]
[SIZE=1280x720][youtube]m0dLPbaUD0A[/youtube][/SIZE][/center]
[font=Georgia][size=3][color=#fdeada]A temporary and permanent cave retreat from the harsh weather of Skyrim. Enjoy the beautiful landscapes and vistas as viewed from atop a mountain in the Rift. Can be easily accessed on the map, just look for the camp marker near the alchemist's shack. [LINE]
[center][img]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm57/vegasfirebird/Nexus/Rift%20Cave%20Dwelling/ScreenShot38_2_zpsc8924f57.jpg[/img][/center]

The Non Player Home Retreat version supports two bedrolls, a lightable camp fire with cooking spit [/color][color=#e36c09](use flame magic)[/color][color=#fdeada], a relaxing area with a table & chairs and ale, and a respawning chest for temporary storage.
[LINE]
[center][img]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm57/vegasfirebird/Nexus/Rift%20Cave%20Dwelling/Non%20Player%20Retreat/ScreenShot23_zps70106ba2.jpg[/img][/center]
The home version features four bedrolls, a lightable camp fire with cooking spit, a table & chairs and ale, basic containers, a smithing area with storage, and sitting on the edge feature![/color][/size][/font]
[LINE]
[center][img]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm57/vegasfirebird/Nexus/Rift%20Cave%20Dwelling/Player%20Home%20Edition/ScreenShot43_zps9f505f0b.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm57/vegasfirebird/Nexus/Rift%20Cave%20Dwelling/Player%20Home%20Edition/ScreenShot50_zpsb4ebc185.jpg[/img][/center]
[LINE]
[center][size=5][font=Georgia][color=#e36c09]Near Future Plans:[/color][/font][/size][/center][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#fdeada]Incorporate more creature comfort items for the home version. More special containers, lockable containers, food storage area, and more smithing containers and options. I need to finish up the nav mesh so your followers can enter the cave.

If you have any suggestions on how to make this better then please share your ideas! Feel free to upload your images to the library. I would love to see what your Skyrim looks like. Kudos are always welcome in the comments tab along with any bugs you may find.

*Note* Please if you've already downloaded and installed the temporary version please delete that file before installing the permanent version! It is likely to cause a CTD. And also, I can put this on any mountain in the game. Just ask me and I'll see what I can do ;-)[/color][/size][/font]
[LINE]
[center][size=5][font=Georgia][color=#e36c09]Video thanks to GTAHammer of youtube[/color][/font][/size][/center]
author: SkyriManiak
